linux_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: SteamOS
  • Processor: Intel i5 8th gen or newer
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GTX 1070 or newer
  • Storage: 1 GB available space
  • Sound Card: N/A
  • VR Support: N/A
  • Additional Notes: This game runs off of smart phones quite well so really not sure how low to go.
linux_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: SteamOS
  • Processor: Intel i7 10th gen or newer
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GTX 2070 or newer
  • Storage: 1 GB available space
  • Sound Card: N/A
  • VR Support: N/A
  • Additional Notes: This game runs off of smart phones quite well so really not sure how low to go.

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: macOS 10.12 Sierra or Newer
  • Processor: Core i5
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: AMD Radeon Pro W5700X MPX Module or Newer
  • Storage: 1 GB available space
  • Sound Card: N/A
  • Additional Notes: This game runs off of smart phones quite well so really not sure how low to go.
mac_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: macOS 10.14 Mojave or Newer
  • Processor: Core i7
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: AMD Radeon Pro W6900X MPX Module or Newer
  • Storage: 1 GB available space
  • Sound Card: N/A
  • Additional Notes: This game runs off of smart phones quite well so really not sure how low to go.
